additional.message_body:
Brandie

 

Here are the standard options I see:

 

Blue Cross Blue Shield individual blue plans.  Whatever the price is, we can make it tax deductible for the business owner.  Fortunately or unfortunately BCBS is essentially a monopoly in Alabama.
[url] [personal_name] puts together several plans to reduce the rates of normal BCBS plans.  [phone_number] his cell. [url]  Whatever the price is, we can make it tax deductible for the business owner. 
Medical cost sharing plans.  These are typically much cheaper, however they are not traditional insurance.  [url]  I cannot make the premiums tax deductible, but I might still be advantageous.

 

 

Thanks

 

[personal_name]
